column3: ACK (reviewed, tested links, tested downloadable packages)\n
Updated to completely remove the section on installing git.\n
from https to http, this is not nice.\nDo we (or, brew) verify the hashes?\n
Maybe we should also mention that installing `git` is no longer required because `git` comes with Xcode 5 and higher which is obviously required to build bitcoin.\n
We can probably pull out the bit about installing git. Or maybe just note that it will be installed with Xcode.\n
Yes. Agreed with removing the git section (or mention something like "git is required and will be installed with a recent version of Xcode").\n
I agree, where possible https links must be used!\n
Removing this if unnecessary is even better.\n
